Installation
============

To install the File Processor, follow these steps:

1. Clone the repository:

   .. code-block:: bash

      git clone https://github.com/AtharvaD-coder/command-line-file-processing-tool.git
      cd file-processor

2. (Optional) Create and activate a virtual environment:

   .. code-block:: bash

      python -m venv venv
      source venv/bin/activate  # On Windows, use `venv\Scripts\activate`

3. Install the required dependencies:

   .. code-block:: bash

      pip install -r requirements.txt

You're now ready to use the File Processor!
